column6: "THE END OF HISTORY" PART 1 (OF 4) Beloved X-Men creators CHRIS CLAREMONT and ALAN DAVIS return to the series that started it all! New alliances are forged as old friendships are rekindled, but one thing is certain: The X-Men will never be the same!
column8: | writer:Chris Claremont | inker:Mark Farmer | colorist:Liquid Graphics
